sources.title: Porky's Super Service (1937)
sources.description: Porky Pig runs a service station and, with the aid of mischievous child, succeeds in wrecking his place.

metadata.Plot: Porky owns a full-service gas station; he deals with a wide variety of problems, like a bump that migrates to different parts of the car. But his real nemesis is a supposedly sleeping baby in a car whose tire needs changing; in fact, the baby is wide awake and a real brat. Both Porky and the brat end up covered in grease; the irate mother drives off, but the child has tied a pump to a tire, which ends up pulling the whole station into the ground.
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, Elvia Allman, Joe Twerp
